ATLAS AIR WORLDWIDE   2020 ESG Report     19Understanding where and how we can reduce our environmental impact 
is a priority embraced across our organization. From industry-leading, 
fuel-efficiency innovations to enhancing our modern, efficient fleet, we will 
achieve results for the planet we all share.IN THIS SECTION:
